description: Output all attributes of a given ExampleClass entity
documentation:
# Get ExampleClass Entity Attribute

## Description
Get attributes of the provided ExampleClass entity.

## Inputs
* **class_entity** (Any): ExampleClass entity, i.e. from the component/workflow "Create ExampleClass Entity" or from a stored object.

## Outputs
* **name** (String): Attribute "name" of the ExampleClass entity.
* **amount** (Integer): Attribute "amount" of the ExampleClass entity.
* **value** (Float): Attribute "value" of the ExampleClass entity.

## Details
It is not possible to execute the component on its own, but only in the context of a workflow, where the class_object is provided by the component "ExampleClass" from the category "Classes".
name: ExampleClass Entity Attributes
